abstract: British government announces measures to combat voter fraud, including tightened identification and absentee ballot requirements; critics say measures may make it harder for minorities and supporters of opposition Labour Party to vote.
lead_paragraph: The government announced plans to fight voter fraud by requiring voters to show official ID, tightening rules on absentee ballots and preventing political activists from handling such ballots.
snippet: The government announced plans to fight voter fraud by requiring voters to show official ID, tightening rules on absentee ballots and preventing political activists from handling such ballots....

headline.main: As U.K. Tightens Voting Rules, Critics Say Labour and the Poor Will Suffer
headline.print_headline: Britain Tightens Voting Rules in Plan Critics Call Excessive
